verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he will cut a better deal with Iran] , [ARGM-LOC: at a rally in Indiana Thursday] , [ARGM-TMP: two days after he announced that the U.S was withdrawing from the Iran nuclear deal] .
President Trump said he [V: will] cut a better deal with Iran , at a rally in Indiana Thursday , two days after he announced that the U.S was withdrawing from the Iran nuclear deal .
